page.title: 16What I did last Weekend
page.content: I spent last weekend with horses. On Saturday, I went riding on my friend's pony. We came from her house in Waterhouse lane up to Perrotts farm, where we did some jumping in the jumping alley. This is a cleared patch of woodland where people can make up their own jumps from dead trees and old branches. When we arrived back at my friend's house we went for a swim in the swimming pool because it was such a hot day. We make assault courses up for each other or have diving competitions. Later on that afternoon we bathed a pony that was going to a show the next day. Also in preparation for the show we spent the rest of the day cleaning her tack, 4 Bridles, 3 Saddles and 2 head collars. On Sunday I rose early to go to Chipstead show with my friend, where she was very successful.
